Bee

Description

Despite their small size, bees tend to protect their hive fiercely. They don't live long though. Bees are small flying creatures that can poison their targets on hit. They are typically found near beehives and spawned from damaged beehives.

Stats

* HP: 35 * Level: Up to 10 * Defense Skill: 10 * Attack Skill: 14 * Damage: 1-3 * Armor: 1 (DR) * Speed: 1.5x (faster than normal) * View Distance: 4 tiles * Attack Delay: 1 * Exp Given: 2 * Loot Chance: 0% * Movement Type: Normal * AI State: Wandering (when spawned), Hunting (when attacking) * Can be Pet: Yes * Flying: Yes (can pass over terrain) * Friendly: No (initially hostile)

Abilities

* Poison Sting: 75% chance (3/4) to inflict poison on hit * Flight: Bees can fly over terrain and obstacles * Hive Protection: Bees spawn from beehives when they take damage or when the hive dies * Bee Spawning: When a beehive is damaged or dies, it spawns 3-8 bees depending on random generation

Behavior

* AI State: Wandering (when spawned), Hunting (when attacking) * Movement Type: Normal * Can be a pet: Yes (can become friendly and follow the player) * Flying: Yes (can pass over terrain like chasms, traps, and other obstacles) * Spawn Source: Primarily spawned from damaged or destroyed beehives * Hive Connection: When a beehive is attacked, it releases 1 bee at a time until 3-8 total bees are released * Final Swarm: When beehive is destroyed, remaining bees (if any) are released all at once

Drops

* Bees have a 0% chance to drop items

Strategy

* Bees are dangerous due to their poison effect, which can significantly damage your health over time * Their high speed means they can quickly close distance with you * Bees are fragile with limited HP, so a single hit from a strong weapon can eliminate them * Be careful when fighting near beehives, as they will spawn bees when damaged
